title: Beetroot salad with buffalo curd cheese
description: For this salad, you even make your own cheese! Thought it was hard? Think again - James Martin shows you how easy it is.
ingredients: 5 whole raw beetroot, tops and leaves left on
2 litres/3½ pints buffalo milk (available from delicatessens and specialist suppliers)
½ baguette, cut into small cubes
1 tbsp fresh oregano leaves, plus extra whole sprigs, to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
